the disorder is characterized by गन्धरतिं [fond of purfumes], माल्यरतिं [fond of flowers], सत्यवादिनः [speaks truth], परिवेपनः [trembles], बहुनिद्राः [sleeps too much]

the disorder is characterized by विप्लुताक्षं [eyes full of tears], त्रस्ताक्षं [querulous eyes], रक्ताक्षं [reddish coloured eyes], शुभगन्धं [body emitings pleasant smell], सुतेजसम् [possessing bright complexion], नृत्यप्रिय [fond of dancing], कथाप्रिय [fond of stories or chatting], गीतप्रिय [fond of songs], स्नानप्रिय [fond of bathing], माल्यप्रिय [fond of garlands], अनुलेपनप्रिय [fond of anointing with cosmetics], मत्स्यरुचिं [desirous of fish], मांसरुचिं [desirous of meat], हृष्टं [joyous], तुष्टं [content], बलिनम् [strong], अव्यथम् [lack of distress], चलिताग्रकरं [fingers always shaking], वादिनम् कस्मै ददामीति [always says what shall i give], वादिनम् किं ददामीति [always says to whom shall i give], रहस्यभाषिणं [speaking secretly/revealing secrets], वैद्यपरिभाविनम् [insulting/degrading the physician], द्विजातिपरिभाविनम् [insulting/degrading the ब्राह्मण (noble man)], अल्परोष [slight anger], द्रुतगति [speedy/quick/swift gait]

the disorder is characterized by अस्वस्थचित्तं [uneasiness in mind], परिधावनम् नैकत्र तिष्ठन्तं [runs around without staying at one place], उच्छिष्टप्रिय [fond of left out things foods], नृत्यप्रिय [fond of dancing], गान्धर्वप्रिय [fond of music], हासप्रिय [fond of humour], मद्यप्रिय [desire to consume alchohol], अमिषप्रिय [fond of meat], निर्भर्त्सनाद्दीनमुख [timid face due to insulting], अनिमित्तत रुदन [crying/weeping without any reason], आत्मानं नखैर्लिखन्तम् [scratching his own body from his nails], रूक्षवपुः [dryness of body], ध्वस्तवपुः [miserable bodily state], रूक्षस्वरः [dryness of voice], ध्वस्तस्वरः [miserable voice], सम्बद्धभाषणम् [relevant speaking], अबद्धभाषणम् [irrelevant speaking], दुःख आवेदनं [stating the misery/agony], नष्टस्मृति [loss of memory], शून्यरति [fond of solitude], लोलं रति [fond of sensuality], नग्नं रति [fond of nudity], मलीमसम् रति [fond of dirty things], रथ्याचैलपरीधानं [wearing rags found in the streets], तृणमालाविभूषणम् [wearing garlands of grass], आरोहन्तं च काष्ठाश्वं [climbing on wooden horses], सङ्करकूटकम् [mingling with bad people], बह्वाशिनं [person with polyphagia]

translation: incurable disorders due to seize of demons (hysteric behavior)
definition: the disorder is characterized by स्थुलाक्ष [excessively swollen eyes], त्वरित गति [walks hastily], स्वफेनलेही [licks his own froth], निद्रालुः [sleepy], पतति [fall], कम्पः [tremors]
the disorder is characterized by वैचित्त्य [confusion or absence of mind], अरतिः [distress/dicontent/restlessness], ग्लानि [fatigue in mind and body]

the disorder is characterized by काष्ठीभूतो मृतोपमः [like a log of wood as if dead], प्राणैर्विमुच्यते शीघ्रम् मुक्त्वा सद्यःफलाः क्रियाः [patient looses his life if not treated early /or as soon as emergency treatment support is withdrawn]
the disorder is characterized by चक्रवद् भ्रमतो गात्रं [patient feels the body rotates like a wheel], पतति सर्वदा [individual keeps falling down]
the disorder is characterized by सर्व-लिङ्गानि [clinical features of all types of doshas]

the disorder is characterized by महत्त शूल/ भृशं शूल [severew pain], शङ्कौ भृशं निस्तुद्येते [severe pricking pain in both temporal regions], घाटा भृशं निस्तुद्येते [severe pricking pain at nape of neck], शङ्कौ सम्भिद्यते [breaking pain at both temporal regions], घाटा सम्भिद्यते [breaking pain at nape of neck], तपतीव भ्रूमध्यं [buring sensation in the middle of eyebrows], तपतीव ललाटं [burning feel in forehead], भ्रूमध्यं अतिवेदना [severe pain in between both eyebrows], ललाटं अतिवेदना [severe pain at forehead], श्रोत्र वध्येते [puncturing pain in both ears], श्रोत्र स्वनः [tininitus], अक्षिणी निष्कृष्येते [feeling as if eyes are being extracted], सर्वं शिरः घूर्णतीव [feels as if head is revolving], सर्वं शिरःसन्धि मुच्यते [sensation of laxation in skull region], सिराजाल स्फुरण [pulsating sensation in vascular plexus], शिरोधरा स्तभ्यते [stiffness of neck], भृशं अर्ति [sudden onset of pain], स्फुरण [pulsating sensation], तीव्र अनिमित्त शिरःरुजा [severe headache with out any apparent cause], निशी अतिमात्रं शिरःरुजा [severe headache in the night], शिरःरुजा बन्धः प्रशमः [headache relieved by bandage], शिरःरुजा तापः प्रशमः [headache relieved by fomentation], कन्धरा संग्रहः [heaviness of head], हनु संग्रहः [locked jaw], प्रकाश असह्यता [intolerance to light/photo.phobia], घ्राण स्राव [rhinorrhoea], अकस्मात व्यथा शमन [sudden relief of pain], मर्दनं मार्दवं जायते [softness generated by massaging], स्नेह मार्दवं जायते [softness generated by oil], स्वेद मार्दवं जायते [softness generated by sudation], बन्ध मार्दवं जायते [softness generated by bandaging]

the disorder is characterized by शिरः दह्यते [burning sensation in head], शिरः रुज्यते/ शिरः अर्ति [headache/discomfort in head], शिरः शीतं सुषूयते [headache on exposure to cold], दह्यते चक्षु/अक्षिदहन [burning sensation in eyes], तृष्णा [thirst], भ्रमः [giddiness or dizziness], स्वेद [sweating], उष्ण भवेत् शिरोरुजा [headache with burning sensation], अंगारचितं भवेत् शिरोरुजा [headache like studded with burning charcoal], धूमवती नासा [feeling of fuming of nose], शीतेन रात्रौ विशेषः [especially in night due to cold], शिरोधूमायन [fuming like sensation in head], ज्वरः [fever], मूर्च्छा [syncope/attacks of swooning], निशि मार्दवम् [softnesss in the night], शीत मार्दवम् [pain subsides by cold things/softness by cold], धूप्यति चाक्षिनासम् (अक्षि-नासयोः धूमपूर्णमिव प्रतीतिः) [feeling of fuming from eyes and nose], शीतेन शमनम् [relieved by cold], रात्रौ शमनम् [subsides at night]

the disorder is characterized by शिरः मन्दरुजा [mild headache], शिरः सुप्तं [numbness in head], शिरः स्तिमित [numbness and heaviness in head], शिरः भारिकम्/शिरः गुरुः/मूर्धा गुरुता/ शिरो-गौरवम् [heaviness of the head], तन्द्रा [drowsiness/lassitude], आलस्य [lethargy], अरोचकः/अरुचिः [tastelessness], शूनाक्षिकूट [peri-orbital swelling], शूनवदन [oedema of face], शीतता [cold], स्तिमित [feeling as if wrapped with wet cloth], शिरानिस्पन्दता [veins not pulsating], अहन् मन्द रुजाः [mild pain at daytime], निशि अधिक रुजाः [more pain at night], कर्ण कण्डू [itching in ear], वमि [vomiting], कफोपदिग्धं [affected with कफ], प्रतिष्टब्ध-शिरः [stiffness of the head], हिम-शिरः [head becomes cold]

the disorder is characterized by शूल [pain], भ्रमः [giddiness or dizziness], कम्पः [shaking of the head], दाहः [burning sensation], मदः [intoxication], तॄषा [thirst], गुरुत्वं [heaviness], तन्द्रा [drowsiness/lassitude], सर्वैस्त्रिदोषं/सर्वाणि लिंगानि समुद्भवन्ति/सर्वलक्षणः [all symptoms are seen/complete expression of disease symptoms]
the disorder is characterized by पित्तसमानलिङ्गः [blister having पित्त dominant features], स्पर्शासहत्व शिरसः [tenderness/inability to tolerate touch], पित्ताधिकरुजा [pitta predominant pain]

the disorder is characterized by व्यध [penetrating type of pain], छेद [cutting type of pain], रुजा/ शिरःअर्ति [pain/headache], कण्डूः [itching], शोफ [oedema], दुःखितम् गति [diseased gait], क्रिमि दर्शन [worm manifesatation], शिरःदौर्गन्ध्य [foul smell from head], शिरःतोद [pricking pain in head], अतिमात्रं शिरःनिस्तुद्यते [severe pricking type of pain in headache], संभक्ष्यमाणं [pain as if being stung by insect], अन्तः स्फुटतीव [breaking pain from inside], अन्तः स्पुरतीव [pulsating sensation from inside], सलिलं सरक्तं घ्राणः गच्छेत [watery and blood stained rhinorrhoea], सलिलं सपूयं घ्राणः गच्छेत [watery rhinorrhoea with pus], घोर वेदना [severe pain], चित्त विभ्रंशजननी [(pain which is )disturbing mind], ज्वरः [fever], कासः [cough], बल क्षय [loss of strength], रौक्ष्य [dryness], दाहः [burning sensation], स्फुरण [pulsating sensation], पूतिता [putrid smell], कपाल कण्डूः [itching in forehead], तालु कण्डूः [itching in palate], शिरः कण्डूः [itching in head], शोष [dryness/wasting/emaciation], प्रमीलक [shutting eyes], ताम्र सिंघाणक [coppery nasal crust], अच्छ सिंघाणक [clear nasal crust], कर्ण नाद [tinnitus]

the disorder is characterized by मन्या वेदना [pain in neck], पश्चाद्घाटा वेदना [pain in nape of neck], वेदना अक्षि अवतिष्ठति [pain resides at eyes], वेदना भ्रू अवतिष्ठति [paoin resides at eyebrows], वेदना शङ्खेष्ववतिष्ठति [pain resides at temporal region], गण्डपार्श्व स्पन्दनं [pulsating sensation at zygomatic region], नेत्ररोगः [eye diseases], हनुग्रहः [lock jaw/catching sensation over jaw], मन्यां सम्पीड्य [pain in neck], तीव्र घाटा रुजा [severe pain in the nape of neck], अक्षि रुजा [pain in eyes], भ्रू रुजा [pain in eyebrows], शंखदेशे रुजा [pain in temporal region], गण्ड-पार्श्व कम्पः [pulsating sensation in zygomatic region], हनुग्रहः [lock jaw/catching sensation over jaw], लोचन रोगः [other eye diseases]

the disorder is characterized by तीव्र शस्त्रनिभां मन्या अतिवेदनाम् [severe pain in neck like that by sharp weapon], तीव्र अरणिनिभां मन्या आतिवेदनाम् [severe pain in neck like that of sting], तीव्र शस्त्रनिभां भ्रू अतिवेदनाम् [severe pain in eyebrows like that by sharp weapon], तीव्र अरणिनिभां भ्रू अतिवेदनाम् [severe pain in eyebrows like that of sting], तीव्र शस्त्रनिभां शङ्ख अतिवेदनाम् [severe pain in temporal region like that by sharp weapon], तीव्र अरणिनिभां शङ्ख अतिवेदनाम् [severe pain in temporal region like that of sting], तीव्र शस्त्रनिभां कर्ण अतिवेदनाम् [severe pain in ear like that by sharp weapon], तीव्र अरणिनिभां कर्ण अतिवेदनाम् [severe pain in ear like that of sting], तीव्र शस्त्रनिभां अक्षि अतिवेदनाम् [severe pain in eyes like that by sharp weapon], तीव्र अरणिनिभां अक्षि अतिवेदनाम् [severe pain in eyes like that of sting], तीव्र शस्त्रनिभां ललाटार्धे अतिवेदनाम् [severe pain in half part of forehead like that by sharp weapon], तीव्र अरणिनिभां ललाटार्धे अतिवेदनाम् [severe pain in half part of forehead like that of sting], अतिवृद्धो नयनं विनाशयेत् [(disease) if progressed very much, damages eye], अतिवृद्धो श्रोत्रं विनाशयेत्/अतिवृद्धो श्रवणं विनाशयेत् [(disease) if progressed very much, damages ear], अतीव उत्तमांगार्ध सम्भेदः [severe breaking pain in upper part of the body/head], अतीव उत्तमांगार्ध तोदः [severe pricking pain in upper part of the body/head], अतीव उत्तमांगार्ध भ्रम [severe giddiness], अतीव उत्तमांगार्ध शूलः [severe pain in head/upper part of the body], अक्स्मात् उत्तमांगार्ध शूलः [sudden headache], पक्षाद् उत्तमांगार्ध शूलः/पक्षाद् कुप्यति [fortnightly headache arises], दशाहाद् उत्तमांगार्ध शूलः [headache arises about every 10 days], अर्ध मूर्ध्नः शिरस्ताप [burning sensation in half part of the head], मासाद् कुप्यति [pain arises within a moth], स्वयमेव शाम्यति [slef limiting pain]

the disorder is characterized by शिरःशूलं दिनवृद्ध्या विवर्धते [headache worsens as day progresses], दिनक्षये ततः स्त्याने [reduces towards end of the day], सूर्योदयं मन्दमन्दं अक्षि रुक्/ [mild pain in eyes at sunrise], सूर्योदयं मन्दमन्दं भ्रू रुक् [mild pain in eyebrows at sunrise], गाढं समुपैति [severe pain in eyes], विवर्धते अंशुमता [(pain) worsens by sunlight], शीतेन शान्तिं लभते [subsides by cold], कदाचिदुष्णेन सुखमाप्नुयात् [sometimes subsides by hot treatment], सूर्योदयाम् शंखः सस्पन्दनाम् रुजः [pulsating pain in temporal region at sunrise], सूर्योदयाम् अक्षिः सस्पन्दनाम् रुजः [pulsating pain in eyes at sunrise], सूर्योदयाम् भ्रू सस्पन्दनाम् रुजः [pulsating pain in eyebrows at sunrise], सूर्योदयाम् ललाट सस्पन्दनाम् रुजः [pulsating pain in forehead at sunrise], मध्याहनम् विवर्धिष्णु [worsens at mid day], विशेषतः क्षुद्वतः विवर्धिष्णु [pain worsens when patient is empty stomach], अव्यवस्थित शीतसुखा [uncertain comfort to cold], अव्यवस्थित उष्णसुखा [uncertain comfort to hot], शाम्यत्यतः परम् [pain subsides later (after sunset)], सूर्यापवृत्तौ विनिवर्तते (अक्षि-भ्रुरुक्) [pain subsides at the sunset]

the disorder is characterized by तीव्ररुक् (शङ्खदेश)/तीव्र शङ्ख रुजा विशेषतः [severe pain in temporal region], दाहः (शङ्खदेश)/ तीव्र दाह [burning sensation in temporal region], राग (शङ्खदेश) [redness/congestion in temporal region], दारुण शोफ/ शंख शोफ [hard swelling in temporal region], विषवद्वेगी [rapid progressing like poison], शिरः निरुध्याशु [immediately affects/blocks the head], गलः निरुध्याशु [quickly choaks the throat], त्रिरात्राञ्जीवितं हन्ति [takes away life within three days], तीव्र मूर्ध्नि रुजा [severe headache], प्रलाप [excess talking/irrelevant speech/incoherent speech], तीव्र रुजा [severe pain], ज्वरः [fever], तृड् [thirst], भ्रमः [giddiness or dizziness], तिक्तास्य [bitter taste in mouth], पीतवदनः [icteric face], क्षिप्रकारी [quick acting]
the disorder is characterized by कम्पः [tremors]

the disorder is characterized by शिरोः अभिताप [buring sensation in head], अतिमात्रम् उग्ररुजाः [excruating pain], रुजाः संस्वेदन विवृद्धि [pain increase by sudation], रुजाः छर्दन विवृद्धि [pain increase by vomitting], रुजाः धूम विवृद्धि [pai increases by fomentation], रुजाः नस्य विवृद्धि [pai increases by nasal instillation of medicine], रुजाः असृग्विमोक्ष विवृद्धि [pain increases by blood letting]
the disorder is characterized by सवर्ण शोफ [swelling which is same colour of the skin], नीरुजः शोफः [painless swelling]

translation: premature graying of hair (due to पित्त and other दोष)
definition: the disorder is characterized by शिरोरुहाणाम् [of hairs], हरिप्रभत्वम् [like that of monkey], केश पचनम् [greying of hairs]
the disorder is characterized by स्फुटितं [split], श्यावं [bluish black colour], खरं [rough], रूक्षं [dry], जलप्रभम् [resembling water], ज्वलत् प्रभं [like that of flames]
the disorder is characterized by सदाहं [associated with burning sensation], पीताभं [yellowish discoloration]
the disorder is characterized by स्निग्धं [scalp is unctuous], विवृद्धिमत् [hairs are growing], स्थूलं [broad], सुशुक्लं [white]
the disorder is characterized by मिश्रलक्षणं [with mixed symptoms]
the disorder is characterized by शिरोरुजोद्भवं [greying caused by headache], विवर्णं [discolouration], स्पर्शनासहम् [tenderness/inability to tolerate touch]

the disorder is characterized by प्रच्यावयति रोमाणि [(it makes) hairs to fall], रुणद्धि रोमकूपांस्तु ततो~ऽन्येषामसम्भवः [obstructs hair roots, hence other hairs can't grow], क्रमात् शातनम् [gradual hair fall]
the disorder is characterized by अग्निदग्धाभा [resembles as though burnt by fire]
the disorder is characterized by स्विन्न/स्वेद [unctuousness], सिरावृत [manifestation of veins on skin]
the disorder is characterized by घन [thick], त्वग्वर्णा [same colour as of the skin]
the disorder is characterized by नखप्रभा [resembles nail], अग्निनेव दग्धः [burnt by fire], निर्लोम [hairless], दाहः [burning sensation]

the disorder is characterized by केशभूमि-कण्डूरम् [itching of scalp], केशच्युति [falling of hairs], केशस्वाप [loss of tactile sensation], केशभूमि रुक्षम् [dryness of scalp], केशभूमि स्फुटनम्/सुसूक्ष्मं त्वचा स्फुटनम् [crack in the scalp], केशभूमि दारुणम् [hardening of scalp], केशभूमि प्रपाट्यते [cracked scalp skin], रुक्ष केश [dry hairs]

translation: eruptions on head having multiple openings/furunculosis
definition: the disorder is characterized by बहुवक्त्राणि मूर्धनि अरूंषि [dry scaly lesions having multiple openings in the head], बहुक्लेदीनि मूर्धनि अरूंषि [moist leisons in scalp], कपाले क्लेदबहुलाः पिटिकाः [moist eruption in scalp region], पिटिका कंगुनिभाः [papules/eruptions resembling कण्गु], पिटिका सिद्धार्थकनिभाः [papules/eruptions resembling सिद्धार्थक]
the disorder is characterized by अर्बुद [tumor]
the disorder is characterized by विद्रधि [abscess]

the disorder is characterized by मुख शोष [dryness of mouth], मुख कार्कश्य [excess dryness of face], मुख रौक्ष्य [dryness of face], चल रुजा [shifting pain], कृष्ण निष्पतनं [black salivation], अरुण निष्पतनं [slightly reddish salivation], शीत निष्पतनं [cold salivation], प्रसंसन (ओष्ठः) [loosening of lips], स्पन्दन (ओष्ठः) [pulsating sensation], तोद (ओष्ठः) [pricking pain in lips], भेद (ओष्ठः) [cracked lip], कर्कशौष्ठः [rough lips], परुषौष्ठः [hard lips], स्तब्धौष्ठः [rigid lips], कॄष्णौष्ठः [dark/blackish lips], तीव्र रुगान्वितः (ओष्ठः) [lips with severe pain], दालनम् (दाल्येते) [cracking of lips], परिपाटनम् (परिपाट्यते) [fissuring of lips], महारुजा [severe pain], असित ओष्ठः [blackish lips]

the disorder is characterized by तृष्णा [thirst], ज्वरः [fever], स्फोटक [blisters], दाह पिडका [nodule with burning sensation], पाक [inflammation/suppuration], धूमायन [smoky/fuming sensation], मूर्च्छा [syncope/attacks of swooning], विविध रुजा [pain of various kind], अवदीर्णता [cracked nature], शुक्ल वर्ण वर्ज्या [appearance of colours except white], अरुण वर्ण वर्ज्या [appearance of colours except red], भृशं सर्षप आकृति पिडका/सर्षप आकृति पिडका [mustard like eruptions], नील संस्राव [bluish discharge], पीत संस्राव [yellowish discharge], कण्डू (ओष्ठः) [itching in lips], सवर्ण पिडका [skin colorted nodule], अवेदना [painless], पिच्छिल (ओष्ठः) [slimeness of lip], शीतल (ओष्ठः) [cold lips], गुरु (ओष्ठः) [heaviness of lips], तीक्ष्ण (ओष्ठः) [sharp lips], असह (ओष्ठः) [tender lips], पीत (ओष्ठः) [yellowish lips], बहुक्लेद (पिडका) [moist eruptions/vesicles], आशुपाक (पिडका) [undergoes quick suppuration], सदाह पिडका [vesicle with burning], सपाक पिडका [vesicle with suppuration], पीताभा पिडका [eruptions appear yellow], सरुजा पिडका [painful vesicle]

the disorder is characterized by कण्डूः [itching], गुरु (ओष्ठः) [heaviness of lips], सित (ओष्ठः) [whitish lip], विज्जल (ओष्ठः) [moist], स्नेह (ओष्ठः) [unctuous lip], अरुचि [tastelessness], जाड्य (ओष्ठः) [rigidity of lips], कफप्रसेक [mucoid salivation], उत्क्लेशः [nausea/provocation of दोष], मन्द अनलः [less sharp digestive capacity], तन्द्रा [confused state], मन्द रुजा [mild pain], सवर्ण पिडका (ओष्ठः) [lesion similar to colour of lips], अवेदनायुत-पिडका (ओष्ठः) [painless eruptions in lips], पिच्छिलौष्ठः [lips become slimy], शीतलौष्ठः [lips become cold], ओष्ठगुरुता [heaviness of lips], शीतासहः (ओष्ठः) [intolerant to cold], शून (ओष्ठः) [oedematous lips]

the disorder is characterized by सर्वाणि रूपाणि [clinical features of all types of दोष], सकृत्कृष्ण (ओष्ठः) [occasionally black lesions], सकृत्पीत (ओष्ठः) [occasionally yellow lesions], सकृत्छ्वेत (ओष्ठः) [ocasionally whitish leison], अनेकपिडका [mutiple nodules], अनेकाभा (पिडका) [nodules of various colors], दुर्गन्ध स्राव (पिडका) [foul smelling discharge], पिच्छिल (पिडका) [slimy nodule], अकस्मातम्लान (पिडका) [suddenly dried nodule], संशून (ओष्ठः) [oedematous lips], रुजा (ओष्ठः) [painful lip], विषम पाकि (पिडका) [nodule with invariable nature of ripening]

the disorder is characterized by खर्जुरफलवर्ण पिडका/खर्जुरसदृशं [eruption resembling the colour of date palm fruit], अर्बुदं क्षीणे रक्ते [tumor after the blood is shed], रुधिरं उपसृष्टः [lips obscured with blood], शोणितप्रभा स्रवतः [bleeding], निपीडित-पिडका [vesicles become painful], -स्रावः [secretion resembling blood]

the disorder is characterized by ओष्ठगुरुता [heaviness of lips], स्थूलौष्ठः [thickening of lips], मांसपिण्डवदुद्गतौष्ठः/मांसपिण्डोपमम [projection of lips like a fleshy lump], मुखाद् सृक्कस्योभयतो जन्तवः मूर्च्छन्ति [maggots coming from both coeners of mouth], क्रमात् कृमि मूर्च्छन [gradual elimination of कृमि (worms)], जन्तु-निर्गमनम् (जन्तवश्चात्र मूर्च्छन्ति) [maggots appears from both angles of mouth]

the disorder is characterized by सर्पिर्मण्डप्रतीकाशौष्ठः/घृतमण्डाभा [lips resembling the supernatent layer of ghee], कण्डूयुतौष्ठः/कण्डूमन्त (ओष्ठ) [itching sensation in lips], स्थिर (ओष्ठ) [stable nature of lip leison], मृदु (ओष्ठ) [soft lips], भृशं अच्छ स्फटिकसंकाश स्रावः/अच्छ स्फटिकसंकाशं स्रावं [crystal clear discharge], गुरु (ओष्ठ) [heaviness of lips], तैलाभ (ओष्ठ) [unctuous lip], श्वयथु (ओष्ठ) [oedematous lips], क्लेद (ओष्ठ) [moistening /soddening of lips], न संरोहनम् व्रणः [non healing ulcer], न मृदुत्व व्रणः [non-softning of ulcer]

the disorder is characterized by क्षतजाभा [traumatic nature], ओष्ठ विदारणम् (विदीर्येते) [cracking of lips], ओष्ठ पाटनम् (पाट्येते ) [fissuring of lips], ग्रथितौष्ठः [nodular swelling of lips], कण्डूसमन्वितौष्ठः [lips associated itching], अवदीर्यते (ओष्ठ) [cracked lip], दशनच्छद् (ओष्ठ) [lip (which covers teeth)]
the disorder is characterized by द्विधा [harelip/cleft lip]
the disorder is characterized by जलबुद्बुदवत् [resembles as water bubbles]

the disorder is characterized by दन्तवेष्टेभ्यः अकस्मात् रक्तस्रावः/दन्तवेष्टेभ्यः अकस्मात् शोणितस्रावः [sudeen bleeding from gums], वहन्त्यस्रमहेतुकम् [bleeding without any cause], दुर्गन्ध दन्तमांसः [bad odour of gums], कृष्ण दन्तमांसः [blackiness of gums], प्रक्लेद दन्तमांसः/ क्लिन्न दन्तमांसः [soddening of gums], मृदु दन्तमांसः [softening of gums], दन्तमांस शीर्यन्ते [decaying of gums], दन्तमांस पचनम् (परस्परम्) [supporation of gums], असित दन्तमांसः [blackish gums]

the disorder is characterized by दन्तयोस्त्रिषु वा महान् श्वयथुः [large swelling around two or three teeth], दन्तयोस्त्रिषु वा महान् रुजा [pain in two or three teeth], दन्तयोस्त्रिषु वा महान् बदरास्थिनिभो शोफः [huge swelling in two or three teeth], दन्तयोस्त्रिषु वा महान् घन शोफः [large hard swelling around two or three teeth], तीव्र रुक् [severe pain], शीघ्र पचन् [quick ripening]
the disorder is characterized by रुधिर-स्रावः [bleeding/haemorrhage], पूयस्रावः [pus discharge], चल दन्तः [tooth moving in socket]
the disorder is characterized by दन्तमूल श्वयथुः [swelling of root of teeth], रुजावान् [painful teeth], लालास्रावः [excessive salivation], कण्डूमान [itching sensation]

the disorder is characterized by दन्त चलनम् [loosening of teeth], दन्तवेष्टावदारणम् [fissuring of the gums], ताल्ववदारणम् [fissuring of the palate], मुख परिपीडन् [affecting the mouth], दन्त मांस पचन् [affecting the gums], ज्वरः [fever], पूय स्रुतिः [pus discharge], रुधिर् स्रुतिः [haemorrhage], विशीर्णद्विजबन्धनः [damaged socket of tooth]
the disorder is characterized by दन्तमांस शीर्यन्ते [decaying of gums], असृक्-ष्ठीवनम् [spitting of blood]

the disorder is characterized by दन्तवेष्ट दाहः/दन्तमांस दाह [burning of gums], दन्तवेष्ट पाकः [supporation of gums], दन्त चलनम् [loosening of teeth], आघट्टिता शोणितं स्रावः [discharge of blood on touching forcefully], मन्द वेदना/दन्तः मन्द रुजा [dull aching pain], आध्मान स्रुते रक्तः [swelling in the gums with oozing of blood], पूति मुख/पूति वक्त्र [foul smell to mouth], रक्त दन्तमांस [reddish /inflammed gums], दन्तमांस उत्सेध [swelling in gums], दन्तमांस कण्डू [itching in gums], दन्तमांस अस्रस्रवन्ते [bleeding from gums], असृजे दन्तमांस आधमान [swolled after stoppage of bleeding]
the disorder is characterized by दन्तमांस घृष्टेषु महान् संरम्भः/दन्तमूल घृष्टेषु महान् संरम्भः [swelling of gums], चल-दन्तः [tooth moving in socket]

the disorder is characterized by तीव्रवेदना [severe pain], व्याधिर्जाते रुक् प्रशाम्यति/जाते तु शाम्यति [pain subsides upon eruption], अधिक दन्त [excessive growth/additional tooth], जायमान अतिरुक् दन्त [severe pain during eruption of tooth]

the disorder is characterized by हानव्ये पश्र्चिमे दन्ते महान् शोथ/दन्तान्ते कीलवच्छोफ [large hard swelling in jaw behind last molar], हानव्ये पश्र्चिमे दन्ते महारुजः [severe pain in jaw behind last molar], लालास्रावः [salivation], हनुरुजा [pain in lower jaw or chin], कर्णरुजा [otalgia], प्रतिहन्त्यभ्यवहृतिं [obstructing the food (during swallowing)/obstruction to passage of food]
the disorder is characterized by विकट-दन्तः [improperly irrupted teeth], कराल दशन समुद्गम [eruption of teeth with horryfying look]

the disorder is characterized by सूक्ष्म संजनयत् गतिम् [small channels/cavities are formed], मुहुः पूयम् स्रवति [recurrent purulent discharge], त्वक् प्रभेदः [disruption of skin], मांस प्रभेदः [eruption of soft tissue], अस्थि प्रभेदः [eruption through bone]

the disorder is characterized by परुष [rough/dry], सूक्ष्ममुखि [having minute opening], सशूला [associated with pain], फेनानुविद्धमधिकं स्रवन्ति क्षपायाम् [exessive frothy discharge which occurs more at night]

the disorder is characterized by तृट् [thirst], ताप [burning sensation], तोद [pricking pain], सदन [exhaustion], ज्वरः [fever], भेदहेतु [tearing sensation], पीत स्राव [excessive yellowish hot discharge occurs during the day], अधिकमुष्ण स्राव [excessive warm discharge]

the disorder is characterized by बहु स्राव [excess discharge], घन स्राव [thick discharge], अर्जुन स्राव [whitish coloured discharge], पिच्छिल स्राव [slimy discharge], रात्रिस्रुतिः [discharge occuring at night], स्तिमित [feeling as if wrapped with wet cloth], रुक् [pain], कठिन [hard], कण्डूः [severe itching]
the disorder is characterized by दाहः [burning sensation], ज्वरः [fever], श्वसन [breathlessness/difficult breathing], मूर्च्छन [syncope/attacks of swooning], वक्त्रशोष [dryness of mouth]

the disorder is characterized by सहसा फेनिलं स्राव [foamy discharge], सहसा मथित स्राव [occasionally frothy discharge], सहसा अच्छ स्राव [occasionally clear discharge], सहसा असृग्विमिश्र स्राव [occasionally blood stained discharge], सहसा उष्ण स्राव [occasionally hot discharge], नित्य रुजा [continuous pain]

the disorder is characterized by दन्तः बहुधा दालयन्ते [teeth are broken badly], तीव्र रुजा [severe pain], द्न्तः उष्ण सह [tolerant to heat], शीत स्पर्शेऽधिक व्यथा [pain worsens by cold items], दालयन्त इव शूलः [breaking pain], दीर्यमाण इव दन्त रुजा [splitting type of toothache]

the disorder is characterized by कृष्ण दन्त [black cavity and loosening of teeth], छिद्रयुक्त दन्त [porous teeth], चल दन्त [tooth moving in socket], स्रावः (दन्त-स्रावः) [discharge from tooth], संरम्भः(दन्त-संरम्भः) [inflammtion of tooth], महारुजः [severe pain in teeth], अनिमित्तरुजः [pain appears without cause], सुषिरे दन्तेऽन्नमलपूरिते [porous tooth filled with debris formed from food], सूक्ष्म कृमि जायन्ते [small maggots are formed], अहेतुतीव्रार्तिशमः [subsiding of severe pain without any treatment], असित दन्त [blackish teeth], चल दन्त [tooth moving in socket], प्रलूनः पूयस्रुति [pus discharge from cut], प्रलूनः रक्तस्रुति [bleeding from cut]

the disorder is characterized by दशनः न शीतः सहन्ते/द्विजाः शीत असहा [unable to tolerate the touch of cold substance], दशनः न उष्णः सहन्ते [unable to tolerate the touch of hot substance], दशनः न स्पर्शनम् सहन्ते/द्विजाः स्पर्शानाम् असहा [unable to tolerate touch//tenderness], द्विजाः प्रवात अक्षमा/द्विजाः प्रवात असहा [teeth cant tolerate wind blow], द्विजाः अम्ल अक्षमा/द्विजाः अम्ल असहा [teeth cant tolerate sour food], द्विजाः शीतभक्षाक्षमा [teeth unable to chew cold food], द्विजाः रुजा भवन्त्यम्लाशनेनेव [pain arises by sour food], चल द्विजाः भवन्त्यम्लाशनेनेव [teeth move by having sour food], द्विजाः रूक्ष असहा [unable to tolerate the touch of dry substance]

the disorder is characterized by द्विजाः तोद [toothache], द्विजाः भेद [breaking of teeth], द्विजाः रुक् [toothache], द्विजाः स्फुटन [scaling /breaking of teeth], वक्त्र वक्रः [distortion of mouth], दन्तभङ्गः [cracking of teeth], तीव्र रुक् [severe pain]

the disorder is characterized by पूतिगन्धि [putrid smell], शर्करेव स्थिरीभूतो मलो दन्तेषु/दन्ते मलः स्थिरीभूतः [foreign matter stuck up between the teeth], द्न्तानाम् गुणहरी [cause affliction of teeth], दन्तमल शोष [dryness of foreign matter], शर्कर इव खरस्पर्श [it becomes like sand with rough touch], दन्तगतमल [debris in teeth]

the disorder is characterized by शर्करया सह दन्तवल्क दालनम् [scaling of enamel of teeth with small particles], दन्तविनाशिनम्/दशनविनाश [destruction of teeth], कपालेष्विव दारणम्/कपालेष्विव दीर्यत्सु [peeling off tartar with pieces of teeth], शर्करा उपेक्षिता दन्तकपाल शातयत्यणुशो [scaling if ignored gradually disrupts tooth enamel]
the disorder is characterized by दन्तस्त्वशेषतः दग्धः [tooth permanantly damaged], नीलताम(नीलदन्त) [bluishness of teeth], श्यावताम (श्यावदन्त)/श्यावद्विजः [blackishness of teeth]
the disorder is characterized by हनुसन्धिर्विसंहतः [dislocation of mandibular joint], अर्दितः लक्षणः [posses features of अर्दित disease- i.e. deviation of mouth]
the disorder is characterized by चल दशन [tooth moving in socket], भक्षणादधिकव्यथाः [severe pain during eating]

the disorder is characterized by दन्तमांस शोफ [oedema in gums], बाह्या गुरु श्वयथुः दन्तमांसे [large swelling outside the gum], अन्तः गुरु श्वयथुः(दन्तमांसे) [large swelling inside the gum], दन्तमांस रुजा [painful in gums], दन्तमांस दाह [burning in gums], पूय स्रवेद्भिन्नः [discharge of pus on brusting of lesion.], अस्र स्रवेद्भिन्नः [discharge of blood stained on bursting of lesion.]

the disorder is characterized by उष्णसहा दन्ता [teeth tolerate only hot things], शीतस्पर्शेऽधिकव्यथाः [causes severe pain by the touch of cold things], दाल्यन्त इव शूलेन [pain appearing as though splitting the teeth.]

the disorder is characterized by स्फुटिता (जिह्वा) [furring of tongue], प्रसुप्ता (जिह्वा)/सुप्ता [loss of taste sensation], शाकच्छदनप्रकाशा (जिह्वा)/शाकपत्रखरा [feeling as the tongue is covered by the leaf of शाक]

the disorder is characterized by दाहः (दह्यति) (जिह्वायाम्)/परिदाह [burning sensation in tongue], पीता (जिह्वा) [yellowish tongue], रक्तकण्टकचिता (जिह्वा)/दीर्घ रक्त कण्टक (जिह्वा) [studding of big bloody red thorny projection], ओष [burning sensation], रक्तमांसांकुरश्चिता [having red colored buds]

the disorder is characterized by गुर्वी (जिह्वा)/गुरु [heaviness of tongue], बहला/बहुलाचिता(जिह्वा) [excessive thickness of tongue], शाल्मलिकण्टकाभः मांसोद्गमः/शाल्मलिकण्टकाभःमांसोच्छ्रयः [tongue resembling projection like the thorn of शाल्मलि]

the disorder is characterized by जिह्वातले प्रगाढ-श्वयथुः/जिह्वाधः शोफः [firm swelling in base of the tongue], प्रवृद्धोः जिह्वां स्तम्भनम्/जिह्वा स्तम्भ/जिह्वा स्तम्भकृदुन्नतः [fixing of the tongue], जिह्वामूले भृशम् पाकः [severe suppuration/inflammation at the root of tongue], पक्वः मत्स्यगन्धि [smell like that of fish], मांसशातन [erosion of soft tissue]

the disorder is characterized by जिह्वोपरिष्टाद्/जिह्वा उपरि स्थिता [situated on upper surface of tongue], दाहः [burning sensation], पाक [inflammation/suppuration], राग [redness/congestion], जिह्वामूलः जिह्वाग्ररूपः श्वयथुः [swelling like tip of tongue], जिह्वामुन्नमनः [raising of tongue], लालाकरः [causing excessive salivation], कण्डूयुतः [associated with itching], ओषः [burning sensation], जिह्वामूल आशु संजनयेच्छोथं [suddenly generates odema at base of tongue]

the disorder is characterized by जिह्वाधस्ताद् [developed under the root of the tongue], दाहः [burning sensation], राग [redness/congestion], पाक [inflammation/suppuration], जिह्वाग्ररूपः श्वयथुः जिह्वाप्रबन्धोपरि [oedema at frenula of tongue], जिह्वाग्र सन्निभः अधोजिह्वा शोफ [a swelling resembling the tip of the tongue developed under the root of the tongue], अंकुरः (जिह्वा) [studded with sprouts], लालास्रावः [excessive salivation], ओष (जिह्वा) [burning sensation in tongue], स्तम्भ (जिह्वा) [loss of movement], खरः (जिह्वा) [rough on touch], रुक् (जिह्वा) [pain in tongue], कण्डू (जिह्वा) [itching], वाक्यविघात [obstruction to the speech], आहारविघात [obstruction to swallowing]

the disorder is characterized by काकले आशु संजनयेच्छोथं [rapid onset of swelling in काकल], ध्मातबस्तिप्रकाश प्रवृद्ध शोफ [large swelling that looks like a size of distended bladder], ध्मातबस्तिप्रकाश दीर्घ शोफ [elongated swelling that looks like a size of distended bladder], तालुमूल प्रवृद्ध शोफ [large oedema at the base of soft palate], तालुमूल दीर्घ शोफ [elongated oedema at the base of soft palate], तृष्णा/तृट् [thirst], कासः [cough], श्वास [breathlessness/difficult breathing], तालुमूले मत्स्यबस्तिनिभो शोफः [fish or bladder shaped odema at the base of soft palate], मृदु शोफः [soft oedema], प्रलम्ब शोफः [elongated swelling], पिच्छिल शोफः [slimy swelling], नासयाऽऽहारमीरयन् [expulsion of ingested food through nose], कण्ठोपरोध [choking sensation of throat/obstruction of throat], वमि [vomiting]

the disorder is characterized by स्थूल शोफ [large swelling], स्थूल शोथ [large swelling], तोदः [pricking pain], दाहः [burning sensation], प्रपाकः [severe inflammation], कार्पासीफलसन्निभः कण्ठ शोफः [pharyngeal swelling as that of fruit of कार्पास], पिच्छिल शोफः [slimy swelling], मन्दरुक् शोफः [swelling with dull aching pain], कठिन शोफः [hard swelling], हनुसन्ध्याश्रितः [associated with temporomandibular joint]

the disorder is characterized by स्तब्ध शोफ (तालुदेशे) [stable swelling at palate region], लोहित शोफ (तालुदेशे) [reddish swelling in palate region], ज्वरः [fever], तीव्ररुक्/रुक् [severe pain], मृदु शोथः [soft red swelling], लोहित शोथः [reddish swelling]

the disorder is characterized by कूर्मोन्नत (शोफ)/कूर्मोत्सन्न [swelling resembling back/shield of tortoise], कच्छपाकार शोफ [tortoise shaped swelling], चिरवृद्धि शोफ [swelling that grows slowly], अवेदना/अरुक् [painless], अशीघ्रजन्मा [slowly developed]

the disorder is characterized by नीरुज (तालुमध्ये) [painless swelling in the middle of palate], तालुमध्य संहत मांसः [thick soft swellling in palate], तालुमध्ये दुष्टं मांसशूनं [inflammed soft tissue swelling in palate], ताल्वन्तःस्थं दुष्टं मांसं [inflammed soft tissue inside the palate]

the disorder is characterized by कोलमात्रशोफः (तालुदेशे)/कोलाभः शोफः [painless, swelling like the size of plum], नीरुक्शोफः (तालुदेशे)/नीरुजः [painless swelling in palate], स्थायीशोफः (तालुदेशे)/स्थिरः [stable/benign swelling in palate]

the disorder is characterized by अत्यर्थघोरं तालुपाकः/पाकाख्यः [excessive suppuration /inflammation of palate], पूयस्रावः [pus discharge], महारुजः [severe pain]

the disorder is characterized by रुजः (तालुमांस) [painful soft tissue at palate], तालुमांस पिटिकाः [eruption in soft tissue of palate], खराः पिटिकाः [rough eruptions], बह्वयो पिटिकाः [multiple eruptions], घन स्राव पिटिकाः [eruptions with thick exudation]
the disorder is characterized by दाह (तालु) [burning sensation in palate], राग (तालु) [redness/congestion of palate], पाक (तालु) [inflammation/suppuration in palate]

the disorder is characterized by जिह्वामूले विदाह [burning sensation at base of tongue], जिह्वामूले भृशं शोथ [large swelling at the base of tongue], जिह्वामूले पृथग्विधा वेदना [variable types of pains at the base of tongue], त्रिरात्रं परं तस्य जन्तोर्भवति जीवितम् [life expectancey is of three days], गलोपसंरोधकरः [creating obstruction in throat], गलाङ्कुरः/गलरोधिनोऽङ्कुरः/मार्गरोधिनः [soft tissue growth which creates obstruction in throat], जिह्वा प्रबन्धजा कण्ठे मांसंकुर [sprout of muscles at the root of tongue in the throat], दारुण [severe], शीघ्रचया [developing and growing fast], शीघ्रकारिणी/ निहन्त्यसून् [killing the patient quickly]

the disorder is characterized by कण्ठ शोष [dryness in throat], आस्य शोष [dryness of mouth], हनुरुक् [pain in lower jaw or chin], श्रोत्र रुक् [otalgia], जिह्वासमन्ताद् मांसङ्कुरः [soft buds all around the tongue], कण्ठनिरोधिः मांसङ्कुरः [soft tissue swelling which obstructs the throat], भृशंवेदना (मांसङ्कुरः) [severe pain at soft swelling], वातात्मकोपद्रवगाढः [complications as per दोष]

the disorder is characterized by ज्वरः [fever], ओष [burning sensation], तृट् [thirst], मोहः [confusion/delirium], कण्ठ धूमायन [fuming sensation in throat], क्षिप्रोद्गमः (मांसङ्कुरः)/क्षिप्रजा [rapidly developing muscular projection], क्षिप्रविदाह (मांसाङ्कुरः) [burning sensation of quick suppuration], क्षिप्रपाकः [quick suppuration], अतिरागः [excess redness/congestion], स्पर्शनासहा [tenderness/inability to tolerate touch], तीव्रज्वरः [hyperpyrexia]

the disorder is characterized by पिच्छिल [slimy], पाण्डु [pale], असृजा [originated from blood], स्फोटकचिता [associated with eruptions or vesicles], स्रोतोविरोधि [obstruction of the channels throat], अचलोद्गतः अङ्कुरः [localised immoblie muscular projection], स्थिरङ्कुरः [fixed muscular projection]
the disorder is characterized by गम्भीरपाकः [deep seated suppuration], अनिवार्यवीर्या [whose progress or nature cannot be controlled], सर्वलिंग समन्वितः [clinical features of all types of दोष]

the disorder is characterized by स्फोटः [blisters], पित्तसमानलिङ्गः [blister having pitta dominant features], तप्त अंगारनिभा [hot as that of burning charcoal], कर्णरुक् [otalgia], पित्तजाकृति [features of that caused by पित्त]

the disorder is characterized by दाहयुक्त-पिडका [burning boils in lids], तोदवती पिडका [boils with pricking pain], ताम्र-पिडका [copper-red boils in the lid margin], मृद्वी-पिडका [soft पिडक], मन्दरुज-पिडका/रुक् [mild painful], सूक्ष्म-पिडका [minute eruptions], वर्त्ममध्ये स्थितः [occuring on the middle of the eyelid], वर्त्मान्ते स्थितः [occuring near lid margin], कण्डूः [itching], ऊषा [burning sensation with sweating and restlessness], स्थिरः [firm], मुद्गमात्रः [green gram sized]

the disorder is characterized by निस्तोदः [pricking sensation in eyes], स्तम्भः [unable to move eyes], रोमहर्षः [horripilation], संघर्षः [foreign body sensation], पारुष्यम् [roughness of eyes], शिरोऽभितापः [burning sensation in head], विशुष्कभावः [dryness of eyes], शिशिराश्रुता/शीताश्रुः [cold tears], नासानाहः [fullness of nose], अल्पशोफता [less swelling], शंखतोदः [pain in temporal region], अक्षितोदः [pricking type of pain in eyes], भ्रूतोदः [pain in the region of eyebrows], ललाटतोदः [pain of the forehead], शंखस्फुरणम् [pulsation in the temples], अक्षिस्फुरणम् [flickering of eyelids], भ्रूस्फुरणम् [flickering of eyebrows], ललाटस्फुरणम् [pulsation of the forhead], शंखभेदनम् [splitting pain in the temples], अक्षिभेदनम् [splitting pain the eyes], भ्रूभेदनम् [splitting pain in the eyebrows], ललाटभेदनम् [splitting pain in the forehead], शुष्कदूषिका [dry rheum], अल्पदूषिका [reduced secretion of rheum], अच्छम् अश्रुः [clear tear secretion], चला रुजः [shifting pain], कृ०९४ड्;च्छ्रात् निमेषोन्मेषणम् [difficulty in opening and closing], जन्तूनां सर्पण इव [formication], अक्षि आध्मात इव आभाति [eyes appear swollen], सूक्ष्मैः शल्यैः इव आचितः [feels as spreaded with tiny arrows], स्निग्धोष्णोपशयः [releif by the use of hot and unctuous substances]

the disorder is characterized by दाहः [burning sensation], प्रपाकः [severe inflammation], शिशिराभिनन्दा [longing for cold application], धूमायनम् [smoky/fuming sensation], बाष्पसमुच्छ्रयः [excessive watering], उष्णाश्रुता [warm tearing], पीतकनेत्रता [yellow discoloration], शोफः [oedema], वर्त्मनः बहिः श्यावता [blackish discoloration on the external part of eyelids], अन्तःक्लेदः [internal moistness], पीताश्रुः [yellowish tears], उष्णाश्रुः [hot tear secretion], रागः [redness/congestion], पीताभदर्शनम् [yellowish vision], क्षारोक्षितक्षताक्षित्वम् [eyes appear as if injured by alkali]

the disorder is characterized by उष्णाभिनन्दता [want of warmth], गुरुता अक्ष्णः [heaviness of eyes], अक्षिशोफः [swelling of eyes], कण्डूः [itching], उपदेहः [stickiness in eyes], सितता [whiteness], अतिशैत्यम् [excessive coldness], मुहुःस्रावः [frequent discharge], पिच्छिल-स्रावः [slimy discharge], जाड्यम् [inactivity of eyes], महान् शोफः [excessive swelling], निद्रा [sleep], अन्नभिनन्दनम् [lack of desire for food], सान्द्रदूषिका [discharge of thick rheum], स्निग्धदूषिका [discharge of unctuous rheum], बहु-दूषिका [excessive secretion of rheum], श्वेत-दूषिका [secretion of whitish rheum], पिच्छावत्-दूषिका [rheum appears slimy], सान्द्राश्रुता [thick tear secretion], स्निग्धाश्रुता [unctuous tear secretion], बहु-अश्रुता [excessive tear secretion], श्वेत-अश्रुता [whitish tear secretion], पिच्छावत्-अश्रुता [slimy tear secretion]

the disorder is characterized by ताम्राश्रुता [coppery lacrimation], लोहितनेत्रता [reddish discoloration of eyes], समन्तादतिलोहिता राज्यः [generalised deep red vascular lines], पित्त-लिङ्गानि/पित्तस्यन्दलक्षणम् [features of पित्तज अभिष्यन्द], रक्ताश्रुः [reddish tear secretion], रक्तराजी [increased vascularity], रक्तदूषिका [reddish rheum secretion], रक्तमण्डलदर्शनम् [seeing reddish halos]

the disorder is characterized by नेत्रम् अत्यर्थम् उत्पाट्यते [feeling as the eye is being extracted], नेत्रम् निर्मथ्यते [feeling as eye is being churned], अर्धशिरः उत्पाट्यते [feeling as half of the head is being extracted], अर्धशिरः निर्मथ्यते [feeling as the half of the head is being churned], तीव्रवेदनाः(नयनयोः) [severe pain in eyes], दीर्घा-बह्व्य- पिडका [numerous large boils], मध्य-दारणम् (दीर्यन्ते) [burst in the middle], रोमहर्षः [horripilation], वेदना [pain]

the disorder is characterized by नेत्रमुत्पाट्यत इव [patient feels as if the eye ball is being extracted out], नेत्रम् अरणिवत् मथ्यते [is being churned up by an अरणि], सङ्घर्षः [foreign body sensation], तोदः [pricking pain], निर्भेदः [splitting type of pain], मांससंरब्धः [intense swelling of the tissue], आविलः [eyeball looks muddy/turbid], अर्धशिरसः कुञ्चनम् [feeling of constriction], अर्धशिरसः स्फोटनम् [feeling of bursting], अर्धशिरसः आध्मानम् [raised tension], अर्धशिरसः वेपथुः [twitchings], अर्धशिरसः व्यथनम् [ipsilateral headache], कर्णनादः [tinnitus], भ्रमः [giddiness or dizziness], ललाटः अरणि इव मथ्यन्ते [feeling as if forehead is churned with अरणि], अक्षिः अरणि इव मथ्यन्ते [feeling as if eyes are churned with अरणि], भ्रूः अरणि इव मथ्यन्ते [feeling as if eyebrows are churned with अरणि]

the disorder is characterized by रक्तराजिचितः [full of red streaks], स्रावः [discharge], वह्निनेवावदह्यते [feels as if burning with fire], यकृत्पिण्डोपमः/यकृत्पिण्डसमप्रभः [looks like a piece of liver], क्षारेणाक्तक्षतदाहः इव दाहः [burning sensation similar to that in a wound treated with caustics], प्रपक्ववर्त्मान्तः [suppuration of lid margins], उच्छूनवर्त्मान्तः [lid margins are in tensley inflammed and oedematous], सस्वेदः [perspiration], पीतदर्शनम् [yellowish appearance], मूर्च्छा [syncope/attacks of swooning], शिरोदाहः [burning sensation in the head], ज्वलदङ्गारकीर्णाभः [eyes resembling burning embers]

the disorder is characterized by शोफवन्नातिसंरब्धः [inflammation of eye ,but not excessively congested], स्रावः [discharge], कण्डूः [itching], शैत्यम् [coldness], गौरवम् [heaviness], पैच्छिल्यम् [sliminess], दूषिका [rheum], हर्षणम् [horripilation], दुःखेन रूपं पश्यति [able to see with difficulty], पांशुपूर्णमिव नेत्रम्/पांशूपूर्णमिवेक्षणम् [eye is dirty as if filled with dust], आविलनेत्रम् [turbid eyes], नासाध्मानः/नासिकाध्मानम् [feeling of tension in the nose and headache], शिरोदुःखम् [headache], नतं कृष्णमण्डलम् [cornea appears depressed], उन्नतशुक्लमण्डलम् [sclera appears raised], प्रसेकः [excessive salivation]

the disorder is characterized by बन्धुजीवकप्रतीकाशः/रागेण बन्धूकनिभः [bright red , like the flower,pentapetesphoenicae], नयनम् ताम्यति [weakness of eyes], स्पर्शनाक्षमः नेत्रः [tenderness of eyes], रक्तस्रावः [blood discharge], निस्तोदः [pricking type of pain], दिशः अग्निनिभः पश्यति/ अग्न्याभदर्शनम् [person see all directions as if on fire], रक्तमग्न अरिष्टवत् कृष्णभागः लक्ष्यते/ असृग्निमग्नारिष्टाभं कृष्णमण्डलम् [eyes apperar similar to अरिष्ट dipped in blood], दीप्तः (नेत्रः) [fiery red eyes], रक्तपर्यन्तः [reddish margins], ताम्रपर्यन्तः [coppery margins], उत्पाटनसमानरुक् [pain as if being torn apart], स्रावः [bleeding through eye]

the disorder is characterized by कण्डूः [itching of eyes], उपदेहः [rheum], अश्रुयुतः [associated with watering], पक्वोदुम्बरसन्निभः/पक्वोदुम्बरसंकाशः [eyes appears like ripe उदुम्बर], दाहः [burning sensation], संहर्षः [gooseflesh like feeling in eyes], ताम्रत्वम् [coppery discoloration], शोफः [oedema], निस्तोदः [pricking type of pain], गौरवम् [heaviness], मुहुः स्रवणम् [repeated discharge], मुहुः उष्णाश्रुः [frequent hot tear secretion], मुहुः शीताश्रुः [frequent cold tear secretion], संरंभः [swelling of eyes], नेत्रपाकः [inflammation/suppuration of eyes], अतिरुक् [severe pain], ष्ठीवनम् [spitting/excess expectoration], मुहुः विशदाश्रुः [frequent clear tear secretion], मुहुः पिच्छिलाश्रुः [frequent slimy tear secretion], मुहुः अच्छाश्रुः [frequent thin tear secretion], मुहुः घनाश्रुः [frequent thick tear secretion]
the disorder is characterized by शोफहीन-लिङ्गानि [all feature of sasopha netrapaka except swelling], अल्पशोफः [less swelling]

the disorder is characterized by उग्र-रुजाः [severe pain], सादयति प्रसह्य [sudden shrinking of eyeball], अनेकरूपा वेदनाः [different types of pain], दृष्टिव्रणः [wound in the visual faculty], दृष्टिनाशः [loss of vision]

the disorder is characterized by पर्यायशः पक्ष्मद्वयरुजा [sometimes pain in both the eyelids], पर्यायशः अक्षिरुजा [sometimes pain in the eyes], पर्यायशः भ्रूरुजा [sometimes pain in the eyebrows], जिह्मनेत्रम् [distortion of eyes or vision], ऊननेत्रम् [depressed eyeball], वारंवारं च पर्येति भ्रुवौ नेत्रे [repeated attacks in the brows and the eyes], विविधास्तीव्र-रुजः (वारंवारं भ्रुवौ नेत्रे) [severe pain]

the disorder is characterized by कूणितवर्त्म/विकूणनम् [closed eyelids], दारुणवर्त्म [hard eyelids], रूक्ष-वर्म [closed, hard dry eyelids], आविलदर्शनम् विलोकने [blurred vision], प्रतिबोधने सुदारुणम् [difficulties in opening the eyes], घर्षः [rubbing friction], तोदः [pricking pain], भेदः [breaking type of pain], उपदेहः [excess discharge of rheum], कृच्छ्रोन्मीलनम् [difficulty in opening the eyelids], कृच्छ्रनिमीलनम् [difficulty in closing the eyes], विशुष्कत्वम् [dryness of eyes], शीतेच्छा [desire for cold], शूलः [pain], पाकः [inflammation/suppuration], वर्म संदह्यते [burning eyelids]

the disorder is characterized by भ्रू रुजा [pain in the eyebrows], लोचन-रुजा [pain in the eyes], तीव्रव्यथा [severe pain], अपैच्छिल्यम् [lack of sliminess], अरागः [absence of redness], अशोफः [absence of swelling], पर्यश्रुसंकोचः [absence of tears]

the disorder is characterized by शोफः [oedema], लोहितदृक्/ लोहितनेत्रम् [redness of eyes], नीलदृक् [bluish discolortion of eyes], श्यावनेत्रम् [blackish discoloration of eyes], दाहः [burning sensation of eyes], पाकः [inflammation/suppuration], अश्रुः [tear secretion], भृशं आविलदर्शनम् [sudden onset of blurred vision]

the disorder is characterized by अवेदनः [painless], सवेदनः [associated with pain], ताम्राक्षिराज्यः [coppery coloured lines], मुहुः विरागः [frequent discoloration], रक्तराजीततः [covered with red streaks], ऊषा [burning sensation with sweating and restlessness], वेदना [pain], अशोफः [absence of swelling], अश्रुरहितः [absence of excessive tear secretion], उपदेहरहितः [absence of excessive secretion of rheum]

the disorder is characterized by प्रगाढताम्राभ-अस्र-स्रावः [thick coppery coloured tears], प्रगाढ-अच्छ-अस्र-स्रावः [thick clear tears], अभिवीक्षणाशक्तिः/वीक्षणाक्षमः [difficulty in vision], राजी वर्धते [increased vascularity (than sirotpAta)]

the disorder is characterized by शोफः [oedema], संरम्भः [redness/congesion/inflammation], कलुषाश्रुता [turbid eyes], कफोपदिग्ध असितमण्डलम् [cornea appears covered with कफ], प्रक्लेदयुक्त-शुक्लमण्डलम् [excessive moistness of sclera], दाहः [burning sensation], दर्शनसंरोधः [impairment of vision], अनवस्थितवेदना [pain moving from one place to another], श्वेत-समाक्रामति सर्वतः [whitish opacity covers the whole of the cornea]

translation: partial or total blindness/amaurosis/ametropia/partial obstruction of vision
definition: the disorder is characterized by अभूतदर्शन [seeing unexisted things], भ्राजिष्णुरूपदर्शन [capable of visualising dazzling objects], दूरान्तिकस्थ दर्शन [near appearance,remote objects], ह्रस्वदर्शन [objects,mixed form or confused form]
the disorder is characterized by अव्यक्त-रूप-दर्शनम्/रूपम् अव्यक्तमीक्षते [blurring vision], अनिमित्ततः व्यक्तं अपि ईक्षते [intermittent spontaneous clear vision]

the disorder is characterized by दृष्टिर्भृशं विह्वलति [severe impaired vision], मक्षिका-दर्शनम् [pseudovisulization of files], मशक-दर्शनम् [pseudovisualization of mosquitoes], केश-दर्शनम् [pseudovisualization of hairs], जालक-दर्शनम् [pseudovisualization of webs], मण्डल-दर्शनम् [visualization pseudo of circles], पताका-दर्शनम् [pseudovisualization of flags], मरीची-दर्शनम् [pseudovisulization of mirages], कुण्डल-दर्शनम् [visualization pseudo of earrings], विविध-परिप्लव-दर्शनम् [seeing of various moving celestial objects], वर्षमभ्र-दर्शनम् [visulization of rain and cloud], तमो दर्शनम् [seeing darkness], दूरस्थानि रूपाणि समीपतः मन्यते/दूरस्थं रूपं विपर्यासेन मन्यते [the distance object appears to be nearer], समीपस्थानि दूरे मन्यते/अन्तिकस्थं रूपं विपर्यासेन मन्यते [the near object appears to be far], अत्यर्थं यत्नवानपि सूचीपाशं न पश्यति [unable to locate the eye of the needle even with great efforts], अभूतमपि पश्यति [visulazation of nonexistant things], भूतं यत्नेन आसन्नं वा पश्यति [sees existant objects with difficulty by going close to them], दूरं सूक्ष्मं न इष्यते [cannot see distant or minute objects]
the disorder is characterized by समीपस्थ-रूपादर्शनम् [non visualization of near object]
the disorder is characterized by पार्श्वस्थानि न पश्यति [side vision is affected]
the disorder is characterized by सङ्कुलानीव पश्यति [objects appear overlapping]

translation: diplopia along with mis-judgement of dimension
definition: the disorder is characterized by द्विधादर्शनम् [double vision]
the disorder is characterized by त्रिधा पश्यति [images appear three in number]
the disorder is characterized by बहुधा-दर्शनम् [object appears multiples]
the disorder is characterized by दूरस्थ-रूपादर्शनम् [non visualization of far object]
the disorder is characterized by एकं मन्यते द्विधा [double vision]

the disorder is characterized by रूपाणि भ्रमन्तीव पश्यति [seeing of objects as if they are moving], आविलरूपदर्शनम् [objects are seen hazy], अरुणाभाणां रूपाणां दर्शनम् [objects are seen slightly reddish], व्याविद्ध दर्शनम्/व्याविद्ध इव पश्यति [objects are seen tortous], चलरूपदर्शनम् [visualization of moving objects], मुहुः प्रसन्नं च ईक्षते [frequent clear vision], जालदर्शनम् [pseudovisualization of webs], केश-दर्शनम् [pseudovisualization of hairs], मशक-दर्शनम् [pseudovisualization of mosquitoes], रश्मी-दर्शनम् [pseudovisualization of rays]

the disorder is characterized by आदित्य-दर्शनम् [seeing the flashes of sun], खद्योत-दर्शनम्/खद्योतद्योतदर्शनम् [seeing the glow worm], शक्रचाप-दर्शनम् [seeing rainbow], तडिद्गुण-दर्शनम्/विद्युत् दर्शनम् [seeing of flashing of lightening], शिखिबर्हविचित्रनीलकृष्णरूपदर्शनम्/ प्रायः शिखितित्तिरपत्राभनीलं पश्यति [sees objects in the colour of feather of peacock], नृत्यतः शिखिन इव सर्वं नीलं पश्यति [seeing everything blue like dancing peacock]

the disorder is characterized by स्निग्ध-रूप-दर्शनम् [seeing the objects as glossy], सित-रूप-दर्शनम्/श्वेतं पश्यति [seeing the objects as white], गौरचामरवत् गौर-रूप-दर्शनम् [seeing the object like whitish yolk tail], श्वेताभ्रप्रतिम-रूप-दर्शनम् [seeing object as whitish cloud], अत्यर्थम् असूक्ष्माणि पश्यति [seeing excessively big objects only], व्यभ्रे अभ्रसंप्लव-दर्शनम् [visualizing clouds in cloudy sky], सलिलप्लावितानीव परिजाड्य-रूप-दर्शनम् [object appear as inundated in water], शंख इव आचितं पश्यति [pupil appears as if filled with appearance of conch], इन्दु-इव आचितं पश्यति [pupil appears as if filled with appearance of moon], कुन्दकुसुम-इव आचितं पश्यति [pupil appears as if filled with appearance of jasmine flower], कुमुद-इव आचितं पश्यति [pupil appears as if filled with appearance of white lotus]

the disorder is characterized by चित्राणि पश्यति [seeing object as of variegated colour], विप्लुतानीव पश्यति [seeing object as if disfigured], बहुधा दर्शनम् [object appears mutiples], द्विधा-दर्शनम् [double vision], सर्वाण्येव समन्ततः दर्शनम् [seeing of images all around], हीनाङ्गानि पश्यति [body parts appear to be less], अधिकाङ्गानि पश्यति [body parts appear to be more], ज्योतींषि पश्यति [sees bright objects like stars], संकीर्णलक्षणान् [mixed symptoms], अकस्मात् व्यक्त-ईक्षणम् [sudden clear vision], अकस्मात् आकुलेक्षणम् [sudden unclear vision]

the disorder is characterized by रक्त-रूप-दर्शनम् [visualizing red object], विविध-तमोरूप-दर्शनम्/तमोभूतं पश्यति [visualization of darkness], हरित-रूप-दर्शनम् [visualization of greenish objects], श्याव-रूप-दर्शनम् [visualization of blackish objects], कृष्ण-रूप-दर्शनम् [visualization of black coloured objects], धूमधूम्राणि ईक्षते [objects are seen as if through smoke], सित-रूपस्य कृष्णारूपंपीतरूपं वा दर्शनम् [white objects appear black or yellow]

the disorder is characterized by ऊर्ध्वम् ईक्षते [presence of vision in upward direction], अधः न ईक्षते [absence of vision in downward direction], तनुचैलावृतोपमदर्शनम् [seeing objects covered by nice cloth], यथावर्णरञ्जनम् [eyes appear in the colour of the respective दोष], क्रमात् दृष्टिः हीयते [gradual decrease in vision], दर्शन अशक्ति [impariment of vision]

the disorder is characterized by ऊर्ध्वम् पश्यति/ऊर्ध्वम् ईक्षते [presence of vision in upward direction], अधः न पश्यति/अधः न ईक्षते [absence of vision in downward direction], महान् रूपाणि अपि वाससा छादितानि इव पश्यति/तनुचैलावृतोपमदर्शनम्/महान्त्यपि रूपाणि अम्बरैः छादितानि इव पश्यति [even large objects appear as if covered with a cloth], कर्णनासाक्षियुक्तानि विपरीतानि (हीनानि) वीक्षते/कर्णनासाक्षिहीनानि विकृतानीव पश्यति [face seems to be appear with the absence of ,ear,nose and eye], यथादोषरञ्जनम्/ यथावर्णरञ्जनम् [दृष्टि having colour as per the afflicting दोष], हीनाङ्गदर्शन [sees body parts as deficient (eg. face without nose etc.)]

the disorder is characterized by दृक् अरुणः पश्यति [दृष्टि appear reddish in colour], पश्यति आस्यं अनासिकम् [visualisation of face without nose], चन्द्रदीपादि अनेकं पश्यति [visualisation of moon, lights etc as multiple], वक्रं ऋजु मन्यते [visualisation of curved objects as straight], अरुण-दृष्टिमण्डलम् [dristimandala becomes red], स्थूलकाचारुणप्रभम् (दृष्टिमण्डलम्) [dristimandala appears like thick shining red glass]

the disorder is characterized by काचनीलाभदृक् [bluish coloration of दृष्टि], काचनीलाभदर्शनम् [visualisation of objects as blue in colour], अर्कपरिवेषः पश्यति [visualisation of halo around the sun], इन्दुपरिवेषः पश्यति [visualisation of halo around the moon], अग्निः पश्यति [pseudovisualisation of fiery objects], मरीचयः पश्यति [pseudovisualisation of mirages], इन्द्रधनूंषि पश्यति [pseudovisualisation of rainbows], नीलरागः [lense is ascribed as blue], म्लायी-रागः [lense appears yellow]

the disorder is characterized by निष्प्रभः [having no lustre], इन्दु इव आचितम् [pupil appears as if filled with appearance of moon], अर्क इव आचितम् [pupil appears as if filled with appearance of sun], प्रदीप-इव आचितम् [pupil appears as if filled with appearance of burning lamp], सिताभ-दृष्टिः [whitish discoloration of दृष्टि], सित-रागः [lens is ascribed as white]
the disorder is characterized by दृष्टौ चित्र-रागः [lens is ascribed of variegated colour]

the disorder is characterized by रक्तदृष्टिः [reddish discoloration of दृष्टि], कृष्णदृष्टिः [blackish discoloration of दृष्टि], रक्तं पश्यति [sees everything as red in colour], कृष्णं पश्यति [sees everything as black in colour], सरक्त- रागः [lense is ascribed as blood-red]

the disorder is characterized by चन्द्रादित्यनक्षत्रविद्युतादि भ्राजिष्णूनि निर्मलानि तेजांसि पश्यति [seeing objects glowing], दृष्टिरोधः [impariment of vision], भ्रमन्ति इव [objects looks as dazzling], ज्योतिष इव दर्शन [seeing star like objects], तडित्कुण [seeing lightning before eyes]

the disorder is characterized by नक्षत्र--दर्शनम् [capable of seeing the stars], निर्मल-तेजांसि पश्यति [capable of seeing clear and bright object], सर्वतो दृष्टिरोधः [all around obstruction of vision], चन्द्रादित्यदर्शनम् [capable of seeing the moon, the sun], अन्तरीक्षे विद्युतः दर्शनम् [capable of seeing lightening in the sky], भ्राजिष्णु-दर्शनम् [capable of visualising dazzling objects], दृष्टिमण्डलच्छादनम् [obstruction of vision]

the disorder is characterized by अरुण-मण्डलम् [the mandala appears reddish], चञ्चल-मण्डलम् [the mandala becomes unstable], परुष-मण्डलम् [irregular-मन्डल], रजोधूमावृतमिव दृष्टिः [unclear vision as if through dust and smoke], स्पष्टारुणाभदृष्टिः [clear reddish discoloration of दृष्टि], विस्तीर्णदृष्टिः [enlarged pupil], सूक्ष्मदृष्टिः [small sized pupil], हतदर्शनम् [loss of vision]

the disorder is characterized by आनीलमण्डलम् [bluish discoloration of मण्डल], कांस्याभमण्डलम् [coppery discoloration of मण्डल], पीतमण्डलम् [yellowish disclolortion of मण्डल], भृंगनीला दृक् [pupils appear bluish black colour similar to that of bee], निरालोकः [loss of vision], स्निग्धदृक् [eyes apperas unctuous], निष्टीव [spitting], प्रसेकः [excessive salivation], रुजा [pain], स्पर्शासहत्वम् [tenderness/inability to tolerate touch]

the disorder is characterized by बहलः [large in size], स्निग्धः [smooth/unctuous /oily], शङ्खपाण्डुरम्/शङ्खशुक्लिमा [offwhite colour similar to conchshell], कुन्दपाण्डुरम्/कुन्दशुक्लिमा [colour similar to that of jasmine flower], इन्दुपाण्डुरम्/इन्दुशुक्लिमा [colour similar to that of the moon], मृद्यमाने नयने मण्डलस्य विसर्पणम् [mandala becomes wide when the eyes are rubbed], दर्शननाशनम् [loss of vision], चलत्पद्मपलाशस्थः शुक्लो बिन्दुरिवाम्भसः/पद्मिनीपुटसंस्थितजलबिन्दु इव चलः [mandala appears like a shining drop of water on a moving leaf of lotus], आतपे अत्यर्थं संकुचति/उष्णे संकोचमायाति [pupil constricts on sunlight], छायायां विस्तृतः भवेत्/छायायां परिसर्पति [pupil dialates in shade], कुमुदशुक्लिमा [whitish colour similar to that of lotus], स्फटिकोपमशुक्लिमा [whitish colour similar to that of quartz crystal]

the disorder is characterized by प्रवालाभः [pearl colour], पद्मपत्राभः [colour, red lotus petal], कृष्णदृक् [blackish discoloration of दृष्टि], निष्प्रभः [lustreless eyes], हतदर्शनः [loss of vision], रक्तदृक् [red coloured vision]
the disorder is characterized by चित्ररागः [multi colour]

the disorder is characterized by दिशः पीतं पश्यति [sees all directions as yellow], दिशः उदयन्तं आदित्य इव पश्यति [seeing rising sun before eyes], तेजोभिः खद्योतैः विकीर्यमाणान् इव वृक्षान् पश्यति [sees trees as if scattered with numerous shining fireflies], अनलप्रभ [colour,glowing fire], आनील [lightblue], मण्डल [circular lesion], म्लायिनीलदर्शन [yellowish blue circular patch appear before eyes], पीतदर्शन [seeing objects, yellow colour], तेजोभि इव [seeing objects as fire]
the disorder is characterized by दृष्टिविदीरणम् [crack], दृष्टिसादः [weakness of eyes], दृष्टिहानिः [loss of vision], ग्लानि [fatigue in mind and body]

translation: vision(lens) is unsteady and slightly red or black in color
definition: the disorder is characterized by आवर्तचलदृष्टिः [encircled with unsteady], अरुणदृष्टिः [objects look like slightly red coloured], असितदृष्टिः [blackish discoloration of दृष्टि], शीत [white coloured]

translation: appearance of white lines in lens
definition: the disorder is characterized by अर्कपयोलेशनिचित इव अतिघनः [lens appears as if smeared with threads of milky sap of arka and is thick /thin], कूर्चिकापिण्डेन इव आचितः [lens appears as if smeared with inspissated milk]

translation: appearance of grains in lens-vision(lens) appears as studded by spikes of paddy grains
definition: the disorder is characterized by शालिशूकाभराजिभिः निचितः [lens appears similar to awns of grains], अभीक्ष्ण-छर्दि [frequent vomiting], अतिबद्ध उच्छ्वसह् [severe restricted expiration], बहल [large in size], भङ्ग [breakingpain], भग्न [breaking pain], गौरव [heaviness], घुर्घुरक [making ghurghur sound], हर्श [horripilation], कण्डूः [itching], पाण्डु [pallor/pale], शोफ [oedema], शुक्ल [white colour], स्राव [watery nose], तमःप्रवेश [feels as entering into darkness]

translation: Appearance of white lines in lens-vision(lens) is uneven(irregular) torn(discontented) and burnt like and is painful
definition: the disorder is characterized by विषमः [irregular/uneven], छिन्नः [splitted], दग्धाभः [burnt apperance], रुजा [pain]

translation: vision(lens) resembles the bell metal colour and moon like appearance.
definition: the disorder is characterized by कांस्यसमच्छाया [coppery hue], चन्द्रकाकृतिः [moon shaped]
the disorder is characterized by छत्राभः [umbrella shaped], नैकवर्णः/चित्ररागः [multi colour], नीलिका [blackish patch on any part of the body]

the disorder is characterized by दृष्टिः पीता भवेत् [yellowish discoloration of eyes], रूपाणि पीतानि मन्यते [sees objects as yellow], दिवा न पश्येत् [day blindness], निशि वीक्षते [normal vision during night], अर्के अस्तमस्तकन्यस्तकगभस्तौ स्थगनम् [loss of vision after sunset]

the disorder is characterized by रूपाणि शुक्लानि मन्यते [patients percepts all objects as white.], नक्तान्ध्यम् [night blindness], दिवा रूपाणि ईक्षेत [during the day eyes are favoured by the sun and the patient can see objects]

translation: blindness due to excess intake of विदाही food
definition: the disorder is characterized by दाहः [burning sensation all over body], ऊषा [burning sensation with sweating and restlessness], मलिनं शुक्लम् [sclera appear dirty], अहनि आविलदर्शनम् [unclear vision during daytime], रात्र्यान्ध्यम् [night blindness]
the disorder is characterized by सर्वभावान् सधूमकान् पश्यति/धूमदृक् [seeing eveything covered with smoke], धूमाविलदृष्टिः [eyes appear dirty with cloudy appearance]
the disorder is characterized by दिवसेषु कृच्छ्रात्-हृस्व-रूप-दर्शनम्/ह्रस्वदर्शनम् [seeing object as small with great difficulties in day time], ह्रस्वसंस्थानः [pupils appear small]

the disorder is characterized by दृष्टिः नकुलवत् विद्योतते [eyes shines like that of mangoose], दिवा चित्र-रूप-दर्शनम्/अह्नि चित्रं पश्यति [seeing object with variegated colour in day time], निशि चित्रं न पश्यति [absence of seeing of objects in variegated colour during night]

the disorder is characterized by विरूप-दृष्टिः [defomed eyes], अभ्यन्तरसंकुचित-दृष्टिः/दृग्मण्डलम् अन्तः प्रविशति [eyes shrink inwards], अवगाढ-रुजा [intense pain], दृक्-सिरासंकोचः [constriction of vessels of eye]
the disorder is characterized by क्लेदः [moistening /soddening], कण्डूः [itching], कलुषदृष्टिः [dirtiness]
the disorder is characterized by अभिष्यन्दनिदर्शनः [features of अभिष्यन्द]

the disorder is characterized by दृष्टिहननम् [blindness], विस्पष्टदृष्टिः [unclear vision], वैडूर्यवर्णदृष्टिः [colour of eye similar to cat's eye gem], विमलदृष्टिः/प्रकृतिस्थमिवाव्यथदृष्टिः [occasional normal vision], स्तिमितदृष्टिः [fixed gaze], दर्शन अशक्ति [impariment of vision], विसर्पैव अवभति [looking bright]

the disorder is characterized by विबन्ध [fullness of ,abdomen due to constipation], शिरशूल [headache], गौरवः [heaviness of the body], घ्राणविप्लवः [stuffy nose], ज्वरः [fever], कासः [cough], कफोत्क्लेशः [nausea with mucous], स्वरभेदः [hoarseness of voice]

the disorder is characterized by शिरोगुरुत्वं [heaviness of head], क्षवथु/क्षव प्रवृत्ति [sneezing], अङ्गमर्दः [generalised bodyache], परिहृष्टरोमता [horripilation], शिरसो अतिपूर्णता [feeling of fullness of head], स्तम्भः [rigidity/stiffness]

the disorder is characterized by नासा-प्रक्लिद्यते/नासिका क्लेद [moistening of nose], नासा-परिशुष्यति/नासिका संशोष [dryness in nose], नासा-पुनरानह्यते [intermittent nasal blockage], नासा-पुनर्विव्रियते [intermittent clearing of nose], अतिदुर्गन्ध-निःश्वासः/अतिदुर्गन्ध उच्छ्वास [bad breath], गन्धान् न वेत्ति [unable to perceive smell], सर्वेन्द्रिय तापनम् [afflicts all sensory organs], अग्निसादः [diminution of अग्नि (digestive power)], ज्वरः [fever], श्वासः [breathlessness/difficult breathing], कासः [cough], उरोवेदनम् [pain in the chest region], पार्श्ववेदना [pain in sides of chest/flanks], अकस्मात् बहुशो कुप्यति [intermittent relapses without apparent reason], मुख दौर्गन्ध्य [halitosis], शोफकृत [odema], नासिका शुद्धि रोधकरो मुहुः [intermittent clearing and obstruction of nose], पूयोपमा ग्रथित श्लेष्म संस्रुति [discharge of thickened mucus resembling pus], असित रक्त ग्रथित श्लेष्म संस्रुति [blackish or reddish tinged thick mucus discharge], दीर्घाः कृमयोः अत्र मूर्च्छन्ति [manifestation of long thread like worms], स्निग्धः कृमयोः अत्र मूर्च्छन्ति [manifestation of unctuous appearing worms], श्वेताःकृमयोः अत्र मूर्च्छन्ति [manifestation of whitish worms], अणवः कृमयोः अत्र मूर्च्छन्ति [manifestation of minute worms]

the disorder is characterized by आनद्धा नासा/ घ्राण उपरोधः [fullness or blocking of nose], पिहिता नासा [feeling as if nose is filled with dust etc], तनुस्रावः [thin watery discharge], गल-शोषः [dryness of throat], तालु-शोषः [dryness of palate], ओष्ठशोषः [dryness of lips], शङ्ख-निस्तोदः [pricking pain in temples], क्षवप्रवृत्तिरत्यर्थम्/भृशं क्षवः [excessive sneezing tendency], वक्त्रवैरस्यम् [tastelessness of mouth], स्वरोपघातः/ स्वरसादः [hoarseness of voice/weakness of voice], दन्त व्यथा [toothache], शंख व्यथा [distress in temporal region (pain)], शिरो व्यथा [distress in the head (pain)], भ्रूवौ कीटिका सर्पन्तिरिव मन्यते [feeling as if insects are crawling in the supraorbital area], चिरात् पाकः [take a long time to suppurate], शिशिर कफ स्रुति [discharge of cold mucus], अच्छ् कफ स्रुति [discharge of clear mucus]

the disorder is characterized by उष्णः स्रावो घ्राणात् [warm and yellowish discharge through nose], सपीतकः स्रावो घ्राणात्/पीत कफस्रुति [yellowish discharge from nose], कृशः [emaciated/thin /malnourished], अतिपाण्डुः [excessive paleness of body], सन्तापः [burning sensation], तृष्णानि(भि)पीडितः [excessive thirst], सधूमं सहसा वह्निं वमतीव च नासाया मानवः [feeling as if he would suddenly vomit out a mass of fire with fumes], घ्राणपिटिका सम्भव [manifestation of eruptions inside nose], भ्रमः [giddiness or dizziness], नासाग्र पाक [suppuration of nose tip], ज्वरः [fever], रूक्ष कफस्रुति [discharge of dried mucus], उष्णःकफस्रुति [discharge of hot mucus], ताम्र कफस्रुति [coppery coloured nasal discharge]

the disorder is characterized by मुहुःशीत-कफस्रावः(घ्राणात्) [cold copius mucous dischage from nose], मुहुःशुक्ल-कफस्रावः(घ्राणात्) [intermittent discharge of white mucus], शुक्लावभासः [whitish appearence of the body], शुक्लाक्ष [whitish colored eyes], शिरो-गौरवः [heaviness of head], कण्ठ अतीव कण्डूः [excessive itching in throat], तालु-अतीवकण्डूः [excessive itching in palate], ओष्ठ-अतीवकण्डूः [excessive itching in lips], शिरःअतीव-कण्डूः [excessive itching in head], कासः [cough], अरुचि [tastelessness], वमथु [vomiting], गात्रगौरव [heaviness of body parts], वदन माधुर्यम् [sweet taste in mouth], स्निग्ध कफ स्रुति [unctuous mucus discharge], शूनाक्ष [swelling in orbital region]

the disorder is characterized by भूत्वा भूत्वा प्रतिश्यायः [reoccurs repeatedly/reoccurs intermittently], संपक्क-अपक्क-सन् -अकस्माभिवर्तनम् [disappears suddenly with or without undergoing inflammation]

the disorder is characterized by रक्तस्रावः [blood discharge], ताम्राक्षः [coppery redness of eyes], उरोघात-प्रपीडितः [afflicted by features of chest injry], दुर्गन्धोच्छ्वासः/श्वास पूतिता [bad odour from nose], दुर्गन्ध-वदनः [foul odour from mouth/hallitosis], गन्धं न वेत्ति [unable to perceive smell], स्निग्धः कृमयोः अत्र मूर्च्छन्ति [manifestation of unctuous appearing worms], श्वेताःकृमयोः अत्र मूर्च्छन्ति [manifestation of whitish worms], अणवः कृमयोः अत्र मूर्च्छन्ति [manifestation of minute worms], कृमिमूर्धविकारेण [disorders of कृमिज सिरो रोग], उरसः सुप्तता [feelingness of numbness over the chest], ताम्र नेत्रत्वम् [coppery coloured eyes], श्रोत्र कण्डु [itching in ear], अक्षि कण्डु [itching in eyes], नासा कण्डु [itching in nose]

the disorder is characterized by अङ्गलाघवं [feeling of lightness in the body], क्षवथोः शमः [subsiding of sneezing], श्लेष्मा सचिक्कणः [nasal discharge become slimy and sticky], श्लेष्मा पीतो [yellowish discharge], अज्ञानं च रसगन्धयोः [inability to understand taste and smell]

the disorder is characterized by घोर देहकर्शनः [severe emaciation of the body], शिरःशूलं [headache], गौरवम् [heaviness], घ्राणविप्लवः [stuffy nose], ज्वरः [fever], कासः [cough], कफोत्क्लेशः [nausea with mucous], स्वरभेद [hoarseness of voice], आरुचिः [tastelessness], क्लमः [exhaustion without exertion], इन्द्रियाणामसामर्थ्यं [inability of sensory and motor organs to perform their activities]
the disorder is characterized by सर्व एव प्रतिश्याया नरस्याप्रतिकारिणः दुष्टतां यान्ति कालेन [if left untreated all types of प्रतिश्याय becomes असाध्य]

the disorder is characterized by बाधिर्यम् [deafness/hearing impairment], आन्धम् [blindness], अघ्राणत्वम् [anosmia], घोरा नयनामयम् [severe eye diseases], कासः [cough], अग्निसादः [diminution of अग्नि (digestive power)], शोथ [oedema]

the disorder is characterized by कफानुयातो बहुशः सशब्दस्तं [कफ comes out from the nose with big noise repeatedly], कफानुयातो अनिलः नासिकेया सशब्दं बहुशः निरेति [vayu along with kapha comes out forcefully through nose with sound]

the disorder is characterized by नासा गाढं परिशोष [excessive dryness of nose], समुच्छ्वसित्यूर्ध्वमधश्च कृच्छ्राद्य [inspiration and expiration with difficulty], शूकपूर्णाभ नासत्वं [feeling as if nose is obstructed with शुक]

the disorder is characterized by घ्राणं वृणोतीव [obstructs the nasal passage], उच्छ्वासमार्गं रुन्ध्यात [obstruction to breathing], नद्धत्वमिव नासायाः [obstructed feeling of nasal cavity], निश्वास उच्छ्वास संरोधः [obstruction in inspiration and expiration]

the disorder is characterized by अजस्रमच्छं सलिलप्रकाशं यस्याविवर्णं स्रवतीह नासा [colourless, clear and water like discharge flows incessantly through the nose], रात्रौ विशेषेण [more marked in the night], अच्छ् स्रावा (नासाया) [clear mucus discharge], जलोपम स्रावः(नासाया) [watery discharge], अजस्र स्रावः(नासाया) [continuous nasal discharge], अविवर्ण स्रावः [colourless discharge], घनः स्रावः [thick/dense discharge], पीत स्रावः [yellowish discharge], सित स्रावः [whitish discharge], तनु स्रावः [thin watery discharge]

the disorder is characterized by नासा आनह्यते [obstruction of the nasal passage], नासा विधूप्यते [smoky sensation in nose], नासा प्रक्लिद्द्यते/ प्रक्लिन्न तेन नासिका [slimyness in nose], नासा शोष [dryness of nose], गन्धः न वेत्ति [inability to recognise smell], रसा न वेत्ति [inability to identify taste], जन्तुजुष्टः [may get infested with organisms], घुर्घुर श्वासः [respiration with ghur-ghur sound], पीनसाधिक वेदनम् [produce more distress than पीनस रोग], आवेरिव स्रवति (नासाया) [discharge from nose like that of sheep], अजस्र स्रावः [continuos discharge], पिच्छिल स्रावः [slimy discharge], पीत स्रावः [yellowish discharge], पक्व सिंघाणकं स्रवति [discharge of nasal excreta which has undergone suppuration], घन सिंघाणकं स्रवति [discharge of thick nasal discharge]

the disorder is characterized by अरूंषिः (बलवान्पाकयुक्तः) [ulceration in nose with marked suppuration], कोथः [wheal like skin eruptions], विक्लेदः (नासायाः) [excessive moistness of nose], नासपुटः पचेत् [suppuration of nose], दाहः [burning sensation], शूल [associated with pain], त्वक् पाक(नासाया) [suppuration of skin of nose], माम्स पाक(नासाय) [suppuration of flesh of nose]

the disorder is characterized by अरुणः श्वयथु [pinkish red swelling], कृष्ण श्वयथु [blackish swelling], मृदु श्वयथु [soft oedema], अनवस्थिता श्वयथु [inconstant swelling], तोदादया वेदनाविशेशः [various types of pain like pricking sensation etc]

the disorder is characterized by पीतः श्वयथुः [yellowish swelling], सरक्तो श्वयथुः [bloody red swelling], मृदुः श्वयथुः [soft swelling], शीघ्रानुसारि [fast spreading swelling], ओषादयः वेदनाविशेषाः [sensations like burning sensation etc]

the disorder is characterized by पाण्डुः श्वयथुः [pale swelling], शुक्लो श्वयथुः [whitish swelling], स्निग्धः श्वयथुः [slimy appearanse of swelling], कठिनः श्वयथुः [hard swelling], शीतो श्वयथुः [swelling is cold in nature], मन्दानुसारी श्वयथुः [develops slowly], कण्डवादयः वेदना विशेषाः [sensations like itching etc]

the disorder is characterized by वृत्त मांसोपचय शोफ [circular swelling over muscles], स्थिर मांसोपचय शोफ [fixed circular swelling], मन्दरुजं [mild pain], महान्तम् [large in size], अनल्पमूलं [broad based], चिरवृद्धि [slow growing], अपाकम् [non suppurating], उच्छ्वासमार्गं रुन्ध्यात [causes obstruction in the nasal pathway]

the disorder is characterized by आयम्यते [feeling of stretching], व्यथ्यते [aching type of pain], तोदं [pricking pain], प्रत्यस्यते कृत्यत एति भेदम् [as if being thrown and also cutting and tearing pains], कृष्णः [blackish discoloration], अमृदु [hard], बस्तिरिवाततश्च [looks like a bladder distended with air], भिन्नः स्रवेद् अस्रमच्छम् [when it bursts discharges sero-sanguinous fluid]

the disorder is characterized by दन्दह्यते [severe burning sensation], धूप्यते [fuming sensation], चूष्यते [sucking type of pain], पापच्यते [intense burning sensation], प्रज्वलतीव [a feeling of being burnt up], रक्तः सपीतोऽप्यथवा [it posses red or yellow colour], भिन्नः स्रवेदुष्णमतीव चास्रम् [discharges hot and excessive amount of blood on bursting]

the disorder is characterized by शीत शोफः [cold swelling], अविवर्णः [without any discolouration], अल्परुजो [associated with mild pain], अतिकण्डूः [excessive itching], पाषाणवत् संहननोपपन्नः [stone like consistency], चिराभिवृद्धिः [increases over a long period of time], भिन्नः स्रवेच्छुक्लघनं च पूयम् [when it burst, discharges white and thick pus]

the disorder is characterized by सास्रावम् [discharge of blood], उन्नह्यति मांसपिण्डं [fleshy protruberance], मांसाङ्कुरैराचितम् [studded with fleshy buds], आशुवृद्धि [rapid growth], स्रवत्यजस्रं रुधिरं [continuous discharge of blood]

the disorder is characterized by शोफम् [odema], अवेदनं [painless swelling], स्निग्ध [smooth swelling], अनन्यवर्णम् [same colour as skin], अपाकम् [non suppurating], अश्मोपमम् [stone like hard swelling], अप्रचाल्यम् [fixed swelling]

the disorder is characterized by स्निग्ध ग्रन्थि [smooth glandular swelling], महान् ग्रन्थि [large swelling], अल्परुजः [mild pain], अतिकण्डूः [excessive itching], भिन्ने पिण्याकसर्पिःप्रतिमं तु मेदः [when bursts it discharges fat which is similar to oil-cake and ghee]

translation: nasal tumor due to three दोष

definition: the disorder is characterized by असृकविमिश्र पूय-नासास्रावः [discharge of blood tinged pus through nose], शिरोदाह [burning sensation in head], शिरोरुजा [headache]
the disorder is characterized by पूतिमुख (पूति वायुः मुखे निरेति) [putrid odour through mouth], पूति नासिका (पूति वायुः नासाया निरेति) [foul smelling air from nose]

translation: eruptions on head having multiple openings/furunculosis
definition: the disorder is characterized by बहुवक्र-अरूंषिः(मूर्ध्नि) [mutiple opening lesion in the scalp], वहुक्लेद-अरुंषिः (मूर्ध्नि) [excessive soddening in scalp]

the disorder is characterized by घ्राणे भृशं दाहः [severe burning sensation in the nose], विनिःसरेद्धूम इव वायुः/धूमोपमा उच्छ्वासः [air that is expired from the nose feels like smoke], नासा प्रदीप्त इव [feeling as if the whole nose has been put on fire], दग्ध इव बाह्य (नासा) [external part of nose feels as if burnt], दग्ध इव अन्तः (नासा) [internal part of nose feels as if burnt], स्पर्शनासहः [tenderness/inability to tolerate touch]

the disorder is characterized by सान्द्र कफः प्रभ्रश्यते [excessive secretion of viscid dense mucus], विदग्धः कफः प्रभ्रश्यते [excessive undigested sour secretion], लवणः कफः प्रभ्रश्यते [excessive salty mucus discharge]
the disorder is characterized by रक्तं नासाप्रभवप्रवृत्तम् [blood flows from nose]

the disorder is characterized by प्रतिश्यायोऽतिमात्रं [cold, catarrh], क्षवथुः [excessive sneezing], कृच्छ्रोच्छ्वासता [difficulty in breathing], पूतिनस्यं [pus discharge from the nose], सानुनासिकवाक्यत्वं [nasal twang in the speech], शिरोदुःखं [headache]

the disorder is characterized by परिशुष्का [dried], अरुण [slightly red in colour], विवर्ण [discoloration], विषममध्या [irregular in the center], कदम्बपुष्पाकृतीनि [like the flowers of कदम्ब (anthocephalus cadamba)], तुण्डिकेरी अकृतीनि [like the wild cotton plant], नाडीमुखाकृतीनि [tubular like appearance], मुकुलमुखाकृतीनि [flower bud like appearance], सूचीमुखाकृतीनि [point of a needle like appearance], सशूलं [associated with pain]

the disorder is characterized by नीलाग्राणि [blue in their presenting part], तनूनि [slender], विसर्पीणि [spreading], पीतावभासानि [yellowish tinge], यकृत्प्रकाशानि [looks like liver], शुकजिह्वासंस्थानानि [shape is like that of a parrot's tongue], यवमध्यानि [barley shaped in the middle], जलौकोवक्त्रसदृशानि [similar to the mouth of a leech]

the disorder is characterized by श्वेतानि [whitish], महामूलानि [broad based], स्थिराणि [fixed], वृत्तानि [rounded], स्निग्धानि [smooth], पाण्डूनि [pale white], करीर [appears like करीर sprout], पनसास्थि [appears like the kernal of a panasa (jack) fruit], गोस्तनाकाराणि [appears like teat of a cow], न भिद्यन्ते न स्रवन्ति [nither burst nor discharge], कण्डूबहुलानि [causes excessive itching]
the disorder is characterized by अन्तर्नासायां शोषः(कफ) [dryness inside the nose], नासान्तः पुटताम् प्राप्नोति [dried कफ causes crust inside the nose]

the disorder is characterized by तीक्ष्णाघ्राणोपयोग [inhaling strong smell], अर्करश्मिऽउपयोग [exposure to sun rays], सूत्रतृणादिभिःउपयोग [inserting threads, grass etc. into nose], अत्यर्थं क्षवथुं [severe sneezing]

the disorder is characterized by नादः [tinitus], अतिरुक् (कर्णयोः) [severe pain in ears], कर्णमल-शोषः [drying of the wax], तनुस्रावः [thin watery discharge], अश्रवणम् [loss of hearing], कर्ण समन्ततः शूलम् (अतीव) [pain around the ears], वेगवान् शूलः [intermittent pain that come in bouts], अर्धावभेदक [hemicranial headache], स्तम्भम् (कर्ण) [rigidity/stiffness in ear], शिशिर अनाभिनन्दनम् [aversion to cold], चिरात् पाकम् [take a long time to suppurate], पक्वम् तु लसीकां अल्पशः स्रवेत् [if suppuration occurs discharge of clear fluid occurs in less quantity], अकस्मात् श्रोत्रं शून्यम् (सञ्चार् विचार् वत्) [occasional feeling of blockage of ears]

the disorder is characterized by शोफः (कर्णः) [odema], सरागः (कर्णः) [redness], दरणम् (कर्णः) [tearing], विदाहः (कर्णः) [internal burning sensation], सपीत-स्रावः (कर्णः) [yellowish discharge], सदाहान्वित शूलम् [pain in the ear associated with burning sensation], ओष [burning sensation], शीतेच्छा [desire for cold], श्वयथु [swelling], ज्वरः [fever], आशु पाकम् [undergoes suppuration quickly], प्रपक्वं च् पीतलसीकास्रुति [after suppuration discharge of yellowish fluid occurs], स लसीका यतः स्पृशेत् ततः पाकमुपेति [wherever the fluid touches, suppuration occurs]

the disorder is characterized by वैश्रुत्यम् [abnormal hearing], कण्डूः [itching], स्थिरशोथः [fixed swelling], शुक्लस्रुतिः [whitish discharge], स्निग्धस्रुतिः [unctuous discharge], स्वल्परुजः [mild pain], शिरोगौरव् [heaviness of head], ग्रीवागौरवम् [heaviness in neck region], हनुगौरवम् [heaviness over mandibular region], मन्द् रुजः [mild pain], कण्डुः [itching inside ear], श्वयथु [swelling around ear], ऊष्णेच्छाः [preference for hot things], पाकात् श्वेत् घन् स्रुति [if suppuration occurs there is discharge of thick white fluid]

the disorder is characterized by अधिक दोषvarNa-srAvaH [dischage according to predominant dosa], सर्व-रूपाणि [clinical features of all types of doshas], पर्यायाद् उष्णशीतेच्छः [alternating preference for hot and cold], श्रुति जाड्य़वत् [impaired hearing], सशोफ [associated with swelling], ज्वरः [fever], तीव्ररुक् [severe pain], पक्वं सित स्राव [on suppuration, exudation of white discharge], पक्वं असित स्राव [on suppuration, exudation of blackish discharge], पक्वं रक्त स्राव [on suppuration, exudation of blood discharge], पक्वं घन स्राव [on suppuration, exudation of thick discharge]

the disorder is characterized by सदाहान्वित शूलम् [pain in the ear associated with burning sensation], ओष [burning sensation], शीतेच्छा [desire for cold], श्वयथु [swelling], ज्वरः [fever], आशु पाकम् [undergoes suppuration quickly], प्रपक्वं च् पीतलसीकास्रुति [after suppuration discharge of yellowish fluid occurs], स लसीका यतः स्पृशेत् ततः पाकमुपेति [wherever the fluid touches, suppuration occurs]
the disorder is characterized by कण्डूः र्भृशं (कर्णयो) [severe itching sensation in the ear canal]
the disorder is characterized by कर्णयो अतीव क्ष्वेडः [hearing of whistling sound], वेणुघोषपम-स्वनम् [hearing of sound like a flute]
the disorder is characterized by शोषित श्लेष्म(कर्ण स्रोतसि सञ्चित) [presence of dried श्लेष्म in the ear]

the disorder is characterized by अरुणः श्वयथु [slightly reddish swelling in ear], कृष्ण श्वयथु [blackish swelling in ear], मृदु श्वयथु [soft oedema], अनवस्थिता श्वयथु [inconstant swelling], तोदादि वेदनाविशेषाः [various types of pain like pricking sensation etc]

the disorder is characterized by श्वेतानि [whitish], महामूलानि [broad based], स्थिराणि [fixed], वृत्तानि [rounded], स्निग्धानि [smooth], पाण्डूनि [pale white], करीर [appears like करीर sprout], पनसास्थि [appears like the kernal of a पनस (jack) fruit], गोस्तनाकाराणि [appears like teat of a cow], न भिद्यन्ते न स्रवन्ति [nither burst nor discharge], कण्डूबहुलानि [causes excessive itching]
